description: Creates a new user account in the system with email verification

parameters.email: string - User's email address (required, must be valid format)
parameters.password: string - User's password (required, min 8 characters, must contain uppercase, lowercase, and number)
parameters.username: string - Unique username (required, 3-20 characters, alphanumeric only)
parameters.phone: string - Phone number with country code (optional)
parameters.preferences: object - User preferences for notifications and privacy (optional)
